sentences.sContent: Localised disease may be treated at first with relatively inexpensive drugs such as nystatin, miconazole or clotrimazole.
sentences.sContent_eng: Localised disease may be treated at first with relatively inexpensive drugs such as nystatin, miconazole or clotrimazole.
sentences.sCn: 治疗局部感染可先使用较为便宜的药物，如制霉菌素、咪康唑或克霉唑等。

sentences.sContent: The results of drug sensitivity showed that amphotericin (AMB) and nystatin (NYS) were the most sensitive and flucytosine (5- Fc ) was the most resistant (54.2%).
sentences.sContent_eng: The results of drug sensitivity showed that amphotericin (AMB) and nystatin (NYS) were the most sensitive and flucytosine (5- Fc ) was the most resistant (54.2%).
sentences.sCn: 药敏结果显示，药物敏感性最高为两性霉素（AMB）和制霉菌素（NYS），耐药性最高的为5-氟胞嘧啶（54.2%）。

trans.tranOther: an antibiotic obtained from the bacterium Streptomyces noursei: used in the treatment of infections caused by certain fungi, esp Candida albicans
